channel.title: Personal on Shreyas Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Shreyas Mayya

item.title: The Last Week
item.description: Today, June 26, marks 15 weeks since my first day in quarantine. For reference, that's a long time.1 Since I don't want to review Java graphics concepts (¿Qué es un búfer?), I figured I would look back on the events leading up to the closing of in-person school.2 March 6, 2020 Virginia Science Olympiad sent out an email saying that they were monitoring the situation. March 7, 2020 Southern California Science Olympiad decided to cancel their state tournament.
